description:
When he sees someone handing out free balloons, Kotarou tries to collect as many as he can. But there`s a reason he wants so many balloons.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kazoku no Tame ni / Odekake no Riyuu / Oshare Michi / Shimei Shitemiru / Shashin ni Chuui / Temiyage o Douzo
家族のために / おでかけの理由 / おしゃれ道 / 指名してみる / 写真に注意 / 手土産をどうぞ
